Question: Shenzhen Mileseey Technology Co. , Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Mileseey Technology Co., Ltd.

Laser Measurement and Control Products

- Laser Distance Meter, Wall Detector, Laser Level
- Monocular/Binocular Laser Rangefinder, Infrared Thermal Imager, Night Vision Equipment
- Salinometer, Refractometer
- Laser Ranging Sensor, Laser Displacement Sensor, Lidar
- 125 Intellectual Property Rights
- Sold in 50+ Countries
- 6000㎡ Manufacturing Center
- High-tech enterprise specializing in laser measurement and control for over 12 years
- Focus on precision laser measurement and control industry
- Diversified technology company
- Committed to providing high-quality, high-tech ranging solutions
- Business applications in various industries such as architectural design, home improvement, engineering surveys, and industrial automation.
Summary_cn:
深圳迈力斯科技有限公司

激光测量和控制产品

- 激光测距仪、壁面探测仪、激光水平仪
- 单目/双目激光测距仪、红外热像仪、夜视设备
- 盐度计、折射仪
- 激光测距传感器、激光位移传感器、激光雷达
- 125项知识产权
- 在50多个国家销售
- 6000㎡的制造中心
- 专注于激光测量和控制领域的高新技术企业，经营超过12年
- 专注于精密激光测量和控制行业
- 多元化技术公司
- 致力于提供高质量、高技术的测距解决方案
- 在建筑设计、家装、工程测量和工业自动化等多个行业有商业应用
